com.robsonmartins.acaas

Class MediaResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.UniformResource
        • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
          • com.robsonmartins.acaas.AbstractResource
            • com.robsonmartins.acaas.MediaResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LibrasMediaResource, TTSMediaResource

    public abstract class MediaResource
extends AbstractResource
    Classe abstrata para Servico REST de obtencao de arquivos de midia.

    id - ID do arquivo de midia a ser obtido.

    Author:
    Robson Martins (robson@robsonmartins.com)
